front.title: State transfer between Access Routes during Handoff

abstract.t: This draft aims to document an issue raised in the Mobile IP working group related to fast handoff between Access Routers. The fast handoff work aims to rapidly enable IP service at the new access router. In Mobile IP this implies that Binding Updates at the network layer enable forwarding of packets to the new access router. However, it may also imply other network layer activities because the IP service given to the MN may depend on state which is presently located in the old access router. This draft aims to document the issue through examples so that the IETF can resolve how to approach this issue.
